metadata.description: Community-driven collection of GitHub Copilot plugins, agents, prompts, and skills

plugins.name: project-planning
plugins.description: Tools and guidance for software project planning, feature breakdown, epic management, implementation planning, and task organization.

plugins.name: software-engineering-team
plugins.description: 7 specialized agents covering the full software development lifecycle from UX design and architecture to security and DevOps.

plugins.name: testing-automation
plugins.description: Comprehensive collection for writing tests, test automation, and TDD including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end testing.

plugins.name: azure-cloud-development
plugins.description: Azure cloud development tools including Infrastructure as Code, architecture patterns, and cost optimization.
